TopicTitle: Operation: Kill Bill - Failed Landing Attempts

Articles.Content: So I was recording a video for my new Duna series, and realized I had two orange-shirts on one mission -- a mishap waiting to happen. So I made a spaceplane and picked up Bill. On the return, the plane crashed (luckily I had saved). After multiple landing attempts (due to bad CoM/CoL) I gave up on that plane and sent an asteroid hunter ssto to retrieve Bill. Unfortunately, this was an early prototype (it was already in orbit) and didn't have the modifications I later added for safer landings (wider wheel-base and detachable canards for balanced CoL if the wings fell off). It only took me about 7 tries to successfully land. Here are the failed landing attempts:

I've never seen a strange plane like this.

But nice Vid anyways...

I posted the ship and it's successor on the forums

Edited July 14, 2014 by buzz66boy
